messages.text: Welcome! We have just the gear you need.
Rarities, huh? Well, here's my best stuff.
I see.
What would you like?
What do you want to sell?
What can I repair for you?
Now, who is this for?
Will you be equiping this right now, ${HERO}?
${HERO} can't equip this. Is that OK?
It suits you very well.
How many do you need?
${HERO}'s hands are full, so who wants it?
${HERO} can't hold this ${ITEM}, so who wants it?
OK, here you go.
Is there anything else?
How many can you sell me?
That comes to ${PRICE} coins. Does that sound good?
How about ${PRICE} for this ${ITEM}?
Is ${PRICE} for your ${ITEM}? good?
What rare stuff! How does ${PRICE} coins sound?
The price doesn't suit you? I'm afraid I can't negotiate.
That's my best offer. Take it or leave it.
Good, here's your money.
Please accept this money.
Please take a complimentary Game Ticket.
Who will take this Game Ticket?
You don't need it?
Oh, ${ITEM}? I'm sorry, but we don't handle those.
Oh, this ${ITEM} is in mint condition.
It's ${PRICE} to repair this ${ITEM}, OK?
Then, I will take it.
You don't like the price? Sorry, I don't haggle.
Your repairs are done. Here you go.
Do you need any more repairs?
Feel free to take a look around.
I'm sorry, but that's a little out of your price range.
Thank you very much. Please come again.
